Plot: A normal Friday service at a fast food restaurant becomes interrupted by a police officer who claims an employee stole from a customer, but something more sinister is going on.
Title: Compliance
Actors: Ann Dowd, Matt Servitto, Dreama Walker, Pat Healy
tomatoConsensus: Anchored by smart, sensitive direction and strong performances, Complicance is a ripped-from-the-headlines thriller that's equal parts gripping and disturbing.
